dialog.text: Welcome, Phillippos. I am so glad you came to listen to my manuscript for Book XII of Elements. You will not be disappointed.
My father wanted me to come. I wanted to learn to fight like in the days of Alexander.
Well, young, Phillippos, your name means elements. Perhaps you can glean something from this manuscript for your glory days.
Yeah it also means, horse, lover, horse lover. Meanings don't matter.
